main event: An odd-shaped object was observed in the air near Corsica, Pennsylvania, on March 23, 1959, by two men and a daughter.
interesting points: The object gave off a peculiar light and seemed anchored in the air., It was approximately 39 to 40 feet in size, larger than a small tree nearby., Witnesses reported the object did not resemble any known aircraft., The object was stationary for a period and then took off at high speed., The sighting was part of a report submitted to the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book.
